TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 285
TEI.2.document_title: Miguel Arciniega to Stephen F Austin, 11-12-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Miguel Arciniega to Austin, Bexar, November 12, 1829. Asking Austin's intervention to obtain for him his prior right to purchase a piece of land belonging to the estate of Baron de Bastrop. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 285

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Miguel Arciniega to Austin, Bexar, November 12, 1829. Asking Austin's intervention to obtain for him his prior right to purchase a piece of land belonging to the estate of Baron de Bastrop. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="11-12-1829">November 12, 1829.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
